description:
Intelligent software solutions for construction

The isl-baustellenmanager is our modular software solution, optimally and unconditionally tailored to your needs and processes in construction execution. All workflow steps across the entire process chain—from quantity takeoff in estimation, through work preparation and invoicing, to as-built documentation—can be processed and resolved directly on the 3D model!
The isl-baustellenmanager meets you right where you are today. From simple use cases like graphical quantity takeoff to complex BIM models with attributes—from modeling and construction scheduling simulation to as-built documentation—our software enables you to handle all applications.
With us, you’ll do BIM without even noticing—because our motto is: it has to be simple!
